#!/bin/bash
set -euo pipefail

echo "=== Disk Space Analysis ==="
echo ""

echo "1. Filesystem Usage:"
df -h | grep -v tmpfs | grep -v devtmpfs
echo ""

echo "2. Largest Directories in /:"
du -h --max-depth=1 / 2>/dev/null | sort -hr | head -10
echo ""

echo "3. Largest Files (>1GB):"
find / -type f -size +1G -exec ls -lh {} \; 2>/dev/null | \
  awk '{print $5, $9}' | sort -hr | head -10
echo ""

echo "4. Journal Size:"
journalctl --disk-usage
echo ""

echo "5. Package Cache:"
if [ -d /var/cache/apt/archives ]; then
  echo "APT: $(du -sh /var/cache/apt/archives | cut -f1)"
fi
if [ -d /var/cache/pacman/pkg ]; then
  echo "Pacman: $(du -sh /var/cache/pacman/pkg | cut -f1)"
fi
echo ""

echo "6. Docker Usage:"
if command -v docker &> /dev/null; then
  docker system df 2>/dev/null || echo "Docker not running"
fi
echo ""

echo "7. Old Temporary Files:"
find /tmp -type f -atime +7 2>/dev/null | wc -l
echo " files older than 7 days in /tmp"
echo ""

echo "=== Analysis Complete ==="
EOF

#!/bin/bash
set -euo pipefail

if [ "$(id -u)" -ne 0 ]; then
  echo "Must run as root"
  exit 1
fi

echo "Starting disk cleanup..."

# Initial space
INITIAL=$(df / | tail -1 | awk '{print $3}')

# Clean journal
echo "Cleaning systemd journal..."
journalctl --vacuum-size=500M

# Clean package caches
echo "Cleaning package caches..."
if command -v apt &> /dev/null; then
  apt clean
  apt autoremove -y
fi

if command -v pacman &> /dev/null; then
  pacman -Sc --noconfirm
fi

# Rotate logs
echo "Rotating logs..."
logrotate -f /etc/logrotate.conf

# Remove old compressed logs
echo "Removing old logs..."
find /var/log -name '*.gz' -mtime +30 -delete
find /var/log -name '*.1' -mtime +7 -delete

# Clean tmp
echo "Cleaning temp files..."
find /tmp -type f -atime +7 -delete 2>/dev/null || true
find /var/tmp -type f -atime +7 -delete 2>/dev/null || true

# Docker cleanup
if command -v docker &> /dev/null; then
  echo "Cleaning Docker..."
  docker system prune -f --volumes 2>/dev/null || true
fi

# Final space
FINAL=$(df / | tail -1 | awk '{print $3}')
FREED=$((INITIAL - FINAL))

echo ""
echo "=== Cleanup Complete ==="
echo "Space freed: $(numfmt --to=iec-i --suffix=B $((FREED * 1024)))" 
df -h /
EOF
